attributes.action: ensure that life means life for the offenders, in the case of Baby Peter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Baby P case is just one example of extreme cruelty that is visited upon vulnerable children, who themselves have no recourse to seek help and depend on adults to help them. 
Therefore when the parents or step-parents abuse, and in this case kill
a child, it is a most heinous offence, and therefore should carry the maximum penalty.
We therefore ask that these people are made to serve out their natural lives in prison as a deterrent to others.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. You may wish to sign this petition instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/childrendead/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
